text: The Sanremo Music Festival 1963 was the 13th annual Sanremo Music Festival, held at the Sanremo Casino in Sanremo, province of Imperia between 7 and 9 February 1963. The show was presented by Mike Bongiorno, assisted by Edy Campagnoli and Maria Giovannini. Gianni Ravera served as artistic director. According to the rules of this edition every song was performed in a double performance by a couple of singers or groups.
